description: Oda earns a spot in Jonners' TOTW
title: Oda earns a spot in Jonners' TOTW
title_page: Oda earns a spot in Jonners' TOTW - BBC Sport
maintext: A few Hearts players had a solid game, but Yutaro Oda routinely showed his quality both out wide and coming inside with his strike of the highest standards, hence his spot in Sportscene presenter, Jonathan Sutherland's, team of the week.
